channel.title: Version 3.0 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 3.0.0 (2022-02-22) Break'n Break'n We made changes t' th' menu footer. If ye have yer menu-footer.html partial overridden, ye may have t' review th' styl'n (eg. margins/paddings) 'n yer partial. For a reference take a look into th' menu-footer.html partial that be com'n wit' th' exampleSite.
